## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5ac232761c5ebf70db7ddcd88cb13e4d5fa03c5a11cdbf8f7d570df861a47c57)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'uniswap-v4-scratchpad-poc' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
